Create a protocol

1 In the Clinical Content folder, double-click Protocols.

2 Click New Set.

3 In the left box, select a standard order and click >> to add it to the protocol.

4 When you are finished adding standard orders to the protocol, click Save As.

5 Enter a name for the protocol.

6 Click OK.

7 Click Close.

8 When you are finished creating protocols, click Close.
